resources.string: ML Kit Demo
Picture

HDR Viewfinder Demo:


Tap viewfinder to switch modes.


Normal: Standard camera preview
 Split: Manual exposure control
 HDR: Fused HDR viewfinder


Swipe up/down in Split/HDR modes to change manual exposure values.


The left half of the viewfinder controls exposure time for even-numbered frames, and the right half of the viewfinder controls exposure time for odd-numbered frames
